caption:
Lauren Klein, the vibrant force behind Flourish Law Group and The Wealthy Lawyer $quad is proud to accept the Corporate Counsel’s Women, Influence & Power in Law Award 2024 for the Mental Health & Well-Being Category.

The WILP awards honor in-house and law firm women leaders and allies who have demonstrated a commitment to advancing the empowerment of women in law. Klein has been recognized for her work in mental health and well being initiatives.

As an Estate Planning Attorney, entrepreneur, wife, and mom, Klein overcame adversity and transformed her life. She’s on a heartfelt mission to empower, hosting free estate planning workshops for single mothers and ensuring no family is left vulnerable. As a devoted mother herself, Lauren excels at and shares the art of balancing professional success with personal fulfillment.

“It is such an honor to receive this award, as it reflects a commitment to not only advancing legal excellence but also empowering women in law. I am inspired to continue driving positive change and championing innovation in this industry.” says Klein.

Among other recipients, Klein will be recognized at an awards dinner on Sept. 24 as part of the Corporate Counsel’s Women, Influence & Power in Law Conference in Chicago.

#womeninlaw #mentalhealth #lawyerlife #lawyersofinstagram #womenowned
